title: REFUND
body:
i failclicked and buye d a champ i didn't want to buy. i cant refund it because i dont have any refunds left
> BTW its hecarim.{{champion:120}}

replies.body: Hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and if this was recent and the champ hasn't been used yet they might be able to help out!
